item.title: SAP Business One V9 Version Strings
item.description: Version | Patch Level ----------------------- 900046 | 00 900052 | 01 900053 | 01 Hotfix 1 900055 | 03 900056 | 04 900058 | 06 900059 | 07 900060 | 08 902000 | 09 902001 | 09 Hotfix 1 902002 | 10 Note: I added the Hotfix 1 to clarify. I believe these are correct, I can’t find a definitive source to verify these results. Then in order to check the target databases version, I ran the following against the target database:
